name: TKTokenWatcher
desc: An object that tracks the tokens available in the system.

items.name: var tokenIDs: [String]
items.desc: The token IDs currently available in the system.

items.name: func addRemovalHandler((String) -> Void, forTokenID: String)
items.desc: Adds a removal handler for the specified token ID.

items.name: func setInsertionHandler((String) -> Void)
items.desc: Sets an insertion handler closure to be called when a new token is inserted into the system.
